name: Discorc
description:
Discorc ("Disco-orc") is a "Rhythm Hotline Simulator" created in 42 hours for LudumDare 41

Orcs also have problems that you have to solve, but... just do it with rhythm!

Over 30 different dialogs!

Fonts by ChevyRay

Controls:

  • "Enter" or "Return" select the focused option
  • "Alt"+"Enter" or "Alt"+"Return" switch fullscreen
  • "Escape" let the game suicide

OST in soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/rodel-bixo/sets/discorc-ost
